org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.cardinality

Class CardinalityPusher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.cardinality.CardinalityPusher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAlternativeCardinalityPusher, DefaultCardinalityPusher, LoopSubplanCardinalityPusher, SubplanCardinalityPusher

    public abstract class CardinalityPusher
extends java.lang.Object
    Pushes a input CardinalityEstimates through an Operator and yields its output CardinalityEstimates. As an important side-effect, Operators will store their CardinalityEstimate

    • Method Detail

      • push

        public boolean push(OptimizationContext.OperatorContext opCtx,
                    Configuration configuration)
        Push the input CardinalityEstimates of the operatorContext to the output CardinalityEstimates. If that leaded to an update, also update the TimeEstimate.
        Parameters:
        opCtx - will be subject to the push
        configuration - potentially provides some estimation helpers
        Returns:
        whether an update of the CardinalityEstimates took place

      • canUpdate

        protected boolean canUpdate(OptimizationContext.OperatorContext opCtx)
        Returns:
        whether a doPush(OptimizationContext.OperatorContext, Configuration) execution might result in an update of CardinalityEstimates

        protected abstract void doPush(OptimizationContext.OperatorContext opCtx,
                               Configuration configuration)
        Perform the actual push.
